title: Summer Adoption Drive
description: Join us for our biggest adoption event of the year! Reduced adoption fees, free pet goodie bags, and expert advice on pet care.

title: Vaccination Camp
description: Free vaccinations for pets from low-income households. Rabies, DHPP, and FVRCP vaccines available. First come, first served.

title: Pet First Aid Workshop
description: Learn essential pet first aid skills from certified veterinarians. This hands-on workshop will teach you how to handle common pet emergencies.

title: Annual Fundraising Gala
description: Join us for an evening of dinner, dancing, and auctions to support our shelter animals. All proceeds go towards medical care and supplies.
